mapper.insert: insert into blog_info ( blog_id, title, content, tag_id, file_id, status, create_time, update_time, publish_time, is_original, author, articles_part, blog_sort_id, is_publish, sort) values ( #{pid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tagId}, #{fileId}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{publicTime}, #{ifOriginal}, #{author}, #{articlesQuoted}, #{blogSortedId}, #{ifPublish}, #{sort} )
